verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> there was a <S%G1859>feast<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> there is in <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> by the <S%G4262>sheep<s%> [gate] a <S%G2861>pool,<s%> which is <S%G1951>called<s%> in <S%G1447>Hebrew<s%> <S%G964>Bethesda,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G4745>porticoes.<s%>

In <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2621>lay<s%> a <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G770>sick,<s%> <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G5560>lame,<s%> and <S%G3584>withered,<s%> <S%G1551>[waiting<s%> for the <S%G2796>moving<s%> of the <S%G5204>waters;<s%>

for an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> at <S%G2596>certain<s%> <S%G2540>seasons<s%> into the <S%G2861>pool,<s%> and <S%G5015>stirred<s%> up the <S%G5204>water;<s%> whoever <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G4413>first,<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G5016>stirring<s%> up of the <S%G5204>water,<s%> <S%G1684>stepped<s%> in was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5199>well<s%> from <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1221><s%> <S%G3553>disease<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> he was <S%G2722>afflicted.<s%>]
And a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> was <S%G1563>there,<s%> who had <S%G2192>been<s%> thirty-eight <S%G2094>years<s%> in his <S%G769>sickness.<s%>

When <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> him <S%G2621>lying<s%> there, and <S%G1097>knew<s%> that he had <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G2192>been<s%> a <S%G4183>long<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> [in that condition,] He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "Do you <S%G2309>wish<s%> to <S%G1096>get<s%> <S%G5199>well<s%>?"

The <S%G770>sick<s%> man <S%G611>answered<s%> Him, <S%G2962>"Sir,<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> to <S%G906>put<s%> me into the <S%G2861>pool<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> is <S%G5015>stirred<s%> up, but <S%G1722>while<s%> <S%G3739><s%> I am <S%G2064>coming,<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2597>steps<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> me."
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1453>"Arise,<s%> <S%G142>take<s%> up your <S%G2895>pallet,<s%> and <S%G4043>walk.<s%>"

And <S%G2112>immediately<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G5199>well,<s%> and <S%G142>took<s%> up his <S%G2895>pallet<s%> and [began] to <S%G4043>walk.<s%> <S%G1161>Now<s%> it was the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> on that <S%G2250>day.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> were <S%G3004>saying<s%> to him who was <S%G2323>cured,<s%> "It is the <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> and it is not <S%G1832>permissible<s%> for you to <S%G142>carry<s%> your <S%G2895>pallet.<s%>"

But he <S%G611>answered<s%> them, "He who <S%G4160>made<s%> me <S%G5199>well<s%> was the <S%G1565>one<s%> who <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G142>'Take<s%> up your <S%G2895>pallet<s%> and <S%G4043>walk.<s%>'"
They <S%G2065>asked<s%> him, <S%G5101>"Who<s%> is the <S%G444>man<s%> who <S%G3004>said<s%> to you, <S%G142>'Take<s%> up [your pallet,] and <S%G4043>walk<s%>' ?"

But he who was <S%G2390>healed<s%> did not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> it was; for <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G1593>slipped<s%> <S%G1593>away<s%> while there was a <S%G3793>crowd<s%> in [that] <S%G5117>place.<s%>

<S%G3326>Afterward<s%> <S%G3778><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> him in the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2396>"Behold,<s%> you have <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5199>well;<s%> do not <S%G264>sin<s%> <S%G3371>anymore,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that <S%G3361>nothing<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G5501>worse<s%> may <S%G1096>befall<s%> you."
The <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away,<s%> and <S%G3004>told<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> that it was <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> who had <S%G4160>made<s%> him <S%G5199>well.<s%>

And for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> were <S%G1377>persecuting<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> He was <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath.<s%>
But He <S%G611>answered<s%> them, "My <S%G3962>Father<s%> is <S%G2038>working<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now,<s%> and I <S%G1473>Myself<s%> am <S%G2038>working.<s%>"

For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> were <S%G2212>seeking<s%> all the <S%G3123>more<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> Him, <S%G3754>because<s%> He not <S%G3440>only<s%> was <S%G3089>breaking<s%> the <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> was <S%G3004>calling<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> His <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> <S%G2470>equal<s%> with <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G3762><s%> of <S%G1438>Himself,<s%> <S%G302>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> [it is] <S%G5100>something<s%> He <S%G991>sees<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G4160>doing;<s%> for <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G302><s%> [the Father] <S%G4160>does,<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> in <S%G3668>like<s%> <S%G3668>manner.<s%>

"For the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G5368>loves<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> and <S%G1166>shows<s%> Him <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> that He <S%G846>Himself<s%> is <S%G4160>doing;<s%> and <S%G3173>greater<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> than <S%G3778>these<s%> will He <S%G1166>show<s%> Him, that you may <S%G2296>marvel.<s%>

"For <S%G5618>just<s%> as the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1453>raises<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> and <S%G2227>gives<s%> them <S%G2227>life,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2227>gives<s%> <S%G2227>life<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G2309>wishes.<s%>
"For not <S%G3761>even<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2919>judges<s%> <S%G3762>anyone,<s%> but He has <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> to the <S%G5207>Son,<s%>

in <S%G2443>order<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> may <S%G5091>honor<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as they <S%G5091>honor<s%> the <S%G3962>Father.<s%> He who does not <S%G5091>honor<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> does not <S%G5091>honor<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Him.

<S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, he who <S%G191>hears<s%> My <S%G3056>word,<s%> and <S%G4100>believes<s%> Him who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me, <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> and does not <S%G2064>come<s%> into <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> but has <S%G3327>passed<s%> out of <S%G2288>death<s%> into <S%G2222>life.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, an <S%G5610>hour<s%> is <S%G2064>coming<s%> and <S%G3568>now<s%> is, <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> shall <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G191>hear<s%> shall <S%G2198>live.<s%>

"For <S%G5618>just<s%> as the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> in <S%G1438>Himself,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> He <S%G1325>gave<s%> to the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> in <S%G1438>Himself;<s%>
and He <S%G1325>gave<s%> Him <S%G1849>authority<s%> to <S%G4160>execute<s%> <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> He is [the] <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man.<s%>

"Do not <S%G2296>marvel<s%> at <S%G3778>this;<s%> for an <S%G5610>hour<s%> is <S%G2064>coming,<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are in the <S%G3419>tombs<s%> shall <S%G191>hear<s%> His <S%G5456>voice,<s%>

and shall <S%G1607>come<s%> <S%G1607>forth;<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4160>did<s%> the <S%G18>good<s%> [deeds] to a <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4238>committed<s%> the <S%G5337>evil<s%> [deeds] to a <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment.<s%>

"I <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G3762><s%> on My <S%G1683>own<s%> <S%G1683>initiative.<s%> As I <S%G191>hear,<s%> I <S%G2919>judge;<s%> and My <S%G2920>judgment<s%> is <S%G1342>just,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I do not <S%G2212>seek<s%> My <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> but the <S%G2307>will<s%> of Him who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me.
<S%G1437>"If<s%> I [alone] <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of <S%G1683>Myself,<s%> My <S%G3141>testimony<s%> is not <S%G227>true.<s%>

"There is <S%G243>another<s%> who <S%G3140>bears<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of Me, and I <S%G3609>know<s%> that the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G3140>bears<s%> of Me is <S%G227>true.<s%>
"You have <S%G649>sent<s%> to <S%G2491>John,<s%> and he has <S%G3140>borne<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> to the <S%G225>truth.<s%>
"But the <S%G3141>witness<s%> which I <S%G2983>receive<s%> is not from <S%G444>man,<s%> but I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> that you may be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>
"He was the <S%G3088>lamp<s%> that was <S%G2545>burning<s%> and was <S%G5316>shining<s%> and you were <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G21>rejoice<s%> for a <S%G5610>while<s%> in his <S%G5457>light.<s%>

"But the <S%G3141>witness<s%> which I <S%G2192>have<s%> is <S%G3173>greater<s%> than [that of] <S%G2491>John;<s%> for the <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> Me to <S%G5048>accomplish,<s%> the <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> that I <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of Me, that the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G649>sent<s%> Me.

"And the <S%G3962>Father<s%> who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me, He has <S%G3140>borne<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of Me. You have <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> His <S%G5456>voice<s%> at <S%G4455>any<s%> <S%G4455>time,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> His <S%G1491>form.<s%>
"And you do not <S%G2192>have<s%> His <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3306>abiding<s%> in you, for you do not <S%G4100>believe<s%> Him <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G649>sent.<s%>

"You <S%G2045>search<s%> the <S%G1124>Scriptures,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G1380>think<s%> that in them you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life;<s%> and it is <S%G1565>these<s%> that <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of Me;
and you are <S%G3756>unwilling<s%> <S%G2309><s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to Me, that you may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>
"I do not <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> from <S%G444>men;<s%>
but I <S%G1097>know<s%> you, that you do not <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G1438>yourselves.<s%>

"I have <S%G2064>come<s%> in My Father's <S%G3686>name,<s%> and you do not <S%G2983>receive<s%> Me; <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> shall <S%G2064>come<s%> in his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> you will <S%G2983>receive<s%> him.

<S%G4459>"How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> you <S%G4100>believe,<s%> when you <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> from <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> and you do not <S%G2212>seek<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> that is from the [one and] <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>?

"Do not <S%G1380>think<s%> that I will <S%G2723>accuse<s%> you <S%G4314>before<s%> the <S%G3962>Father;<s%> the one who <S%G2723>accuses<s%> you is <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> in <S%G3739>whom<s%> you have <S%G1679>set<s%> your <S%G1679>hope.<s%>
"For <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> you would <S%G4100>believe<s%> Me; for he <S%G1125>wrote<s%> of Me.
"But <S%G1487>if<s%> you do not <S%G4100>believe<s%> his <S%G1121>writings,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> will you <S%G4100>believe<s%> My <S%G4487>words<s%>?"
